description.displayText: Jessa is absolutely wonderful and we miss her very much! The next family she works with will be very lucky to have her. Jessa is kind, gentle, and patient with children and does as much as she can to encourage development and learning. She's very receptive to feedback and always has a positive attitude. She was never late and always reliable. Our boys were in great hands under Jessa's care and they absolutely love her.
